meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Norm Cobb Louise Balabanian Larry Caplan Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #15.

td.p: Norm Cobb, a sales manager from Garden Grove, California
Louise Balabanian, an English teacher originally from Corpus Christi, Texas
Larry Caplan, an attorney from Tamarac, Florida (whose 1-day cash winnings total $3,700)

tr.td: EDUCATION
TRENDS
U.S. HISTORY
THE COMICS
THE HOME
WORLD SERIES

div.onmouseover:
toggle('clue_J_3_2', 'clue_J_3_2_stuck', '(Alex: The singer is Judy Collins, but that\'s not important right now. I need a question from you.)
(Larry: What is slavery, the Underground Railroad?)
(Alex: No, I\'m sorry, that\'s wrong. The period in history was [*] and the song was "Buddy (or Brother), Can You Spare A Dime?")

the Great Depression

Larry
')

Made it race against time..."')

tr.td:
Episode in history this song is associated with:
"Once I built a railroad, I made it run
Made it race against time..."

Archie Andrews

Norm
')

div.onmouseover:
toggle('clue_DJ_5_1', 'clue_DJ_5_1_stuck', '(Larry: What is Kahlua? [*]?)
(Alex: No. Louise or Norm, do either of you have a question?)
(Norm: What is [*] or milk?)
(Alex: Yes, that\'s it. I had to accept the first question, Larry.)
[NOTE: Prior to the round, Alex said with a tie for second, Norm would pick first after winning a coin toss.]

cream

LarryNorm
')
